languages.text: "Собственной персоной. Своими глазами видел, как его на корабль тащили и передавали в руки техножрецов для сервиторизации".
"The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
languages.original_text: "Собственной персоной. Своими глазами видел, как его на корабль тащили и передавали в руки техножрецов для сервиторизации".

traits.locale_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
"The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
"The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
"The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
"The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

languages.text: “千真万确，我亲眼看到那些人把他拖上了船，交给技术神甫，改造成了机仆。”
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

traits.locale_text: “千真万确，我亲眼看到那些人把他拖上了船，交给技术祭司，改造成了奴工。”

languages.text: « Absolument. Je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux quand ils l'ont traîné à bord du vaisseau et l'ont livré aux technoprêtres afin qu'ils procèdent à sa servitorisation. »
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument. Je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux quand ils l'ont traîné à bord du vaisseau et l'ont livré aux technoprêtres afin qu'ils procèdent à sa servitorisation. »

languages.text: 「まさしく本人だとも。船内を引きずられてサーヴィター化のために技術司祭に引き渡されるのをこの目で見た」
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

traits.locale_text: 「まさしく本人だとも。船内を引きずられてサーヴィター化のために技術司祭に引き渡されるのをこの目で見た」

languages.text: «El mismo. Vi con mis propios ojos cómo lo arrastraban a bordo y lo entregaban a los tecnosacerdotes para que lo convirtieran en servidor».
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

traits.locale_text: «El mismo. Vi con mis propios ojos cómo lo arrastraban a bordo y lo entregaban a los tecnosacerdotes para que lo convirtieran en servidor».

languages.text: "Höchstpersönlich. Ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie sie ihn an Bord geschleppt und ihn den Techpriester für die Servitorisation übergeben haben."
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."

traits.locale_text: "Höchstpersönlich. Ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie sie ihn an Bord geschleppt und ihn den Techpriester für die Servitorisation übergeben haben."

languages.text: "Çok doğru. Çekiştirip gemiye çıkarışlarını, hizmetörleştirmeleri için Tekno Rahiplere teslim edişlerini gözlerimle gördüm."
languages.original_text: "The very same. I watched with my own eyes as they dragged him aboard the vessel and handed him off to the Tech-Priests for servitorisation."
